resources.string: Here is where the Jungler\'s main source of income comes from. In here, monster reside in various places. Rewarding gold and experience when slain. Epic Monsters also spawn later in the game. Giving a team reward when slain and also a huge buff.
The Raptor Camp consists of one large Crimson Raptor and five lesser Raptors.
The Murk Wolf Camp consists of one large Greater Murk Wolf and two lesser Murk Wolves

The Krug Camp consists of one large Ancient Krug and one Medium Krug. Killing the Ancient Krug will spawn two Medium Krugs, and killing Medium Krugs will spawn two lesser Krugs, for a total of 10 units.
The Gromp Camp consists of only itself.
The Blue Sentinel consists of only itself. Killing it will grant the killer the Crest of Insight buff which grants increased mana regeneration and 5% cooldown reduction.

The Red Brambleback consists of only itself. Killing it will grant the killer the Crest of Cinders buff which grants increased health regen and causes basic attacks to slow and burn the enemy over time.
The Rift Scuttler appears on both rivers. Killing it will grant a small area of vision for the killer\'s team around the objective it is closest to

The Baron only spawns at 20mins every game, eliminating the Rift Herald if it hasn\'t been taken by then. Killing it would grant the killer\'s team a buff that greatly increses AD, AP and the speed of recall and an aura that increases the power of nearby minions.

The Dragon comes in 5 forms - Infernal, Cloud, Water, Earth and Elder. Killing it will grant the killer\'s team a dragon buff according to it\'s form. The Elder Dragon only spawns at 35mins. Killing it will grant the killer\'s team a buff that double the buff of anything previous dragons\' buffs.
